xxl.core.spatial.geometries
Interface Line2D

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<Geometry2D>, Curve2D, Geometry2D, LineString2D, java.io.Serializable
public interface Line2D
extends LineString2D

A Line is a LineString with exactly 2 points. Since a Line is a specialisation of a LineString it provides the same functionality.
